column1: Nimrodel was the small river that rose in the eastern foothills of the Misty Mountains
column2: and flowed east to meet the Celebrant on the western borders of Lothlórien. When the Fellowship of the Ring came to the river they could hear it splashing over a waterfall on their right.  There used to be a Bridge of Nimrodel but it had long ago disappeared.  It was said that the water of the stream was "healing to the weary". After passing through Moria
column3: the Fellowship crossed and stopped by the Nimrodel to rest.
